name: The Devil's Yard
description:
A 4-player co-op map based on the campaign map The Devil's Playground.

Difficulty scales for 2-4 players. A general difficulty (easy-brutal) is also selectable in the lobby. Search for "devil" in europe, or feel free to upload and play in other regions.



This map is part of a series of 4-player co-op maps based on the campaign. See also:

- [The Greater Train Robbery](<http://www.sc2mapster.com/maps/greater-train-robbery/>)

<!-- -->
author: _ForgeUser4370295
